resources.string: Ensure your safety by instantly alerting your trusted contacts in emergencies.
Get real-time notifications whenever an SOS alert is triggered.
Share your live location with family and friends for added security.
Access emergency helplines and assistance with just one tap.

"Protectta is a women safety application developed to provide fast and effective help in emergencies. It offers features like SOS alerts, live location sharing, emergency contacts, and helpful safety tips.\n\nOur mission is to empower women with a digital tool they can trust in times of need.
